member.name: T:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.MetricsController
member.summary: Controller for SigOps Metrics ATSPM data

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.MetricsController.Get(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: API method for returning high-level metric data from SigOpsMetrics.com
member.param: One of {main, staging, beta}. main is the production data. staging is an advance preview of production from the 5th to the 15th of each month. beta is updated nightly, but isn't guaranteed to be available and may have errors.
One of {cor, sub, sig} for Corridor, Subcorridor or Signal-level data
One of {qu, mo, wk, dy} for Quarterly, Monthly, Weekly or Daily data. Note that not all measures are aggregated at all levels.
See Measure Definitions above for possible values (e.g., vpd, aogd). Note that not all measures are calculated for all combinations of level and interval.
Start date for data pull
End date for data pull

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.MetricsController.GetByZoneGroup(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: API method for returning metric data by zone group from SigOpsMetrics.com
member.param: One of {main, staging, beta}. main is the production data. staging is an advance preview of production from the 5th to the 15th of each month. beta is updated nightly, but isn't guaranteed to be available and may have errors.
One of {cor, sub, sig} for Corridor, Subcorridor or Signal-level data
One of {qu, mo, wk, dy} for Quarterly, Monthly, Weekly or Daily data. Note that not all measures are aggregated at all levels.
See Measure Definitions above for possible values (e.g., vpd, aogd). Note that not all measures are calculated for all combinations of level and interval.
Start date for data pull
End date for data pull
Zone Group (aka Signal Group) to pull data for

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.MetricsController.GetByCorridor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: API method for returning metric data by corridor from SigOpsMetrics.com
member.param: One of {main, staging, beta}. main is the production data. staging is an advance preview of production from the 5th to the 15th of each month. beta is updated nightly, but isn't guaranteed to be available and may have errors.
One of {cor, sub, sig} for Corridor, Subcorridor or Signal-level data
One of {qu, mo, wk, dy} for Quarterly, Monthly, Weekly or Daily data. Note that not all measures are aggregated at all levels.
See Measure Definitions above for possible values (e.g., vpd, aogd). Note that not all measures are calculated for all combinations of level and interval.
Start date for data pull
End date for data pull
Corridor to pull data for

member.name: T:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.SignalsController

member.summary: Return a list of signals + all details in the SigOps system

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.SignalsController.GetZones

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.SignalsController.GetCorridors

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.SignalsController.GetCorridorsByZone(System.String)

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.SignalsController.GetSubCorridors

member.name: M:SigOpsMetrics.API.Controllers.SignalsController.GetSubCorridorsByCorridor(System.String)
